trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lake Havasu City
There were no other sightings in Lake Havasu City on or around December 13th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsTook the dog out and.I look to the north over the city and saw a cylinder object moving back and forth turning bark green and then white and rowing up and down.I went into the house to get my mother in-law to see this and when.Got back out it was gone.
